overview:
Bartosz Solowiej was on the founding team of Tokbox.com, a startup backed by the likes of Sequoia Capital and Bain Capital. Bartosz has a background in economics and mathematics and is a graduate of Emory University.

When heâ€™s not creating new web apps, Bartosz is very interested in WiMax in developing countries. In 2006, he traveled to the western highlands of Guatemala to install 23 computers in a privately funded high school named Fundacion Ixtatan, and he plans to return there to expand the capabilities of the satellite linked facilities and eventually provide a web connection to the many residents in the municipality.
